channel.title: Git on Today is Tomorrow's Past
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Today is Tomorrow's Past

item.title: Manage Multiple Git Identities With Conditional Includes
Effective Git - Worktrees
item.description: You know this situation: you are working on new feature branch of your product. A bunch of files has been changed, nothing has settled yet and lots of uncommitted changes. This is how work in progress looks like. Everything could be alright, but then you are asked to check out that high priority issue that a customer reported.
